message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point, considering its worth to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. I'm trying to stay within my budget of $15,000.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $11,000 is significantly below its value. I could meet you halfway at $12,500. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget with $12,500. I'd be willing to go up to $12,000, but that's as high as I can go.
